E

EventException - Exception in io.github.nozyx12.jevent
The EventException class represents an exception that occurs during the triggering of an event.
EventException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception io.github.nozyx12.jevent.EventException
Constructs a new EventException with the specified event name and cause.
EventListener - Interface in io.github.nozyx12.jevent
The EventListener interface should be implemented by any class that wants to listen for events.
EventManager - Class in io.github.nozyx12.jevent
The EventManager class manages the registration of event listeners and triggers events.
EventManager() - Constructor for class io.github.nozyx12.jevent.EventManager
 
EventUtil - Class in io.github.nozyx12.jevent
The EventUtil class provides utility methods for accessing the system event manager.
EventUtil() - Constructor for class io.github.nozyx12.jevent.EventUtil
 

G

getEventName() - Method in exception io.github.nozyx12.jevent.EventException
Returns the name of the event that caused this exception.
getSystemEventManager() - Static method in class io.github.nozyx12.jevent.EventUtil
Returns the system event manager instance.
